mapper.select: select p.purchasename, p.purchasenote, p.create_date, p.purchasestate, c.nickname from purchaseform p,purchasecontact c where p.purchaserid=c.purchaserid

select purchaseid, purchasename, purchasegoods, placeorigin, specificationtype, level, warehouse, spotgoods, price, purchasenote, purchasemode, invoicetype, receivaddress, purchasetime, certificate, create_date as createDate, supid, purchaserid, purchasestate from purchaseform
